title: India no longer linked to violent crimes in Canada: Ottawa softens stance ahead of Mark Carney's visit

title: OpenAI hires ex-Apple models head from Meta

content:

title: Amazon's $50 billion OpenAI investment may depend on IPO or AGI, The Information reports
description: Feb 25 (Reuters) - Amazon's plan ⁠to invest up to $50 billion in OpenAI could ⁠depend on whether the AI developer goes public ‌or achieves an artificial general intelligence (AGI) milestone, The Information reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.

title: Anthropic drops hallmark safety pledge in race with AI peers
